ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe?
ygData.msgSnippet: So the picture of the Dwarven Axe I have is as follows: DMG: 6 WT  : 4 DEL: 26 Going price: 7-10pp nonmagical 1-handed slash ...which makes it a good weapon
ygData.messageBody:
So the picture of the Dwarven Axe I have is as follows:

DMG: 6
WT : 4
DEL: 26

Going price: 7-10pp
nonmagical
1-handed slash

...which makes it a good weapon for lvl 5-9 paladins going the 1handed slash &
bash route.

The most competitive upgrade or alternative is the Minotaur axe (my current
weapon):

DMG: 8
WT: 12
DEL: 37

Going price: 5-8pp
nonmagical
1-handed slash

Again, it's been a good weapon to me, but at 9th level I'd like to have a
magical weapon which does equal or better dmg and equivalent delay. So far, the
only upgrade I have heard from the group has been a combine longsword for 50pp.
I've also been watching a related thread on brass magical shields going for 20pp
(magical bash). I have 18pp in the bank.

Is there a magical 1H slashing weapon that lies between the mino axe and the
combine longsword?

Kaladin, Dwarven Paladin
